thread.title: JBlackwell published Leicester City news and transfer rumours - LIVE
thread.title_full: JBlackwell published Leicester City news and transfer rumours - LIVE

author: JBlackwell
title: JBlackwell published Leicester City news and transfer rumours - LIVE
text:
Leicester City news and transfer rumours - LIVE By JBlackwell | Posted: June 24, 2016 0 COMMENTS SHARES Get the latest on Jamie Vardy, Arsene Wenger and N'Golo Kante on our live-blog below. Leicester City news and transfer rumours - LIVE X 
Copy link to paste in your message / Comments (0) 
Jamie Vardy has chosen to stick with Leicester City, signing a new four-year deal, and we will have more reaction to the news, including the opinions of the Football Association and Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger. 
The French manager has also given his views on N'Golo Kante, his place in the France team and his club future. 
We will analyse the potential ramifications of Brexit on the Premier League and City's EU-born players. 
Plus, we will keep you up to date on any breaking transfer news and rumours, regarding both incoming and outgoing switches. 
Stick with us throughout the day on our live blog below:
